name: trace_correlator
description: Follow a distributed trace across services. Shows the full request path with timing, service names, and outcomes for a specific trace ID.
query: FROM traces-apm* | WHERE @timestamp > NOW() - 15 minutes AND trace.id == ?trace_id | SORT @timestamp ASC | KEEP @timestamp, service.name, transaction.name, transaction.duration.us, event.outcome, span.name | LIMIT 50

parameters.name: trace_id
parameters.description: The trace ID to follow across services
